alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Carlton; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:19PM CDT until July 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... North central Pine County in east central Minnesota... Southern Carlton County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, or 19 miles south of Big Sandy Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kettle River, Moose Lake, Barnum, Mahtowa and Nemadji. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
